entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
